issue_title: [Security] CLI 命令直接输出未清洗的 todo.text 到 stdout，存在终端控制字符注入风险
summary: Fixed terminal control character injection vulnerability in CLI commands (add, done, undone) by sanitizing todo.text output using existing _sanitize_text() function from formatter.py.
implementation: Added import of _sanitize_text from formatter module and applied it to todo.text in print statements for add, done, and undone commands (lines 98, 108, 113)
risks_or_limitations: None - minimal change reusing existing sanitization function that already handles all control characters (0x00-0x1f, 0x7f, 0x80-0x9f)
security_impact: Prevents terminal control character injection attacks that could be used to fake todo items or manipulate terminal output
